name: Neighbor’s Creepy Teacher
description:
Its ideal time to take revenge from high school teacher through scary creepy teacher games. Scare your Creepy Teacher by performing various teasing activities to make her angry. You must complete missions / tasks without getting caught and within allocated time.

Scary Teacher, commonly known as cruel teacher in scary creepy teacher in the school. You will recover victim kids photo’s, release pets, place pins and liquid on your teacher chair and run away.
Experience multiple teasing activities in this Scary creepy teacher game.
Features for Scary Creepy Teacher

- Trow cockroach upon your teacher
- Write you are creepy teacher in school on board
-Throw liquid on her way to make her angry
